markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Psi Catastrophe](/Feats.aspx?ID=3684) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Mindshift" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=428" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
<trait label="Psyche" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=429" />
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 28</row>

</column>

---

You stop holding your power back, unleashing it all in a catastrophic blast. All creatures in a 20-foot emanation take 1d6 bludgeoning damage per level with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save. Your psyche subsides as your power is expended.
name: Psi Catastrophe

summary_markdown: You stop holding your power back, unleashing it all in a catastrophic blast.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 12" pfs="Standard" > Psi Catastrophe Two Actions Source Dark Archive pg. 28 --- You stop holding your power back, unleashing it all in a catastrophic blast. All creatures in a 20-foot emanation take 1d6 bludgeoning damage per level with a basic Reflex save. Your psyche subsides as your power is expended.
